The Children’s Performance

A chaotic room, children crying.  
Sonia is frantic.  
Sonia: “What is happening?!”  
Lebeziatnikov: “They’re begging in the street!”  
Lebeziatnikov: “Katerina Ivanovna is out of control!”  

---

Outside, Sonia rushes, cloak flying.  
Lebeziatnikov follows, worried.  
Lebeziatnikov: “She’s definitely lost it!”  
Raskolnikov: “What do we do now?”  
Lebeziatnikov: “Logical arguments might help!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Katerina Ivanovna is exhibiting signs of madness, causing distress among those around her.
